channel.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse_Watch on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse_Watch
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse_Watch Service Datatype Description Local algorithm The algorithm to use when aggregating and comparing. Currently, the only value that is accepted is EWMA (Exponential Weighted Moving Average). EWMA is the default value if no value is given. Type: string createDate When this watch was created. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion.
